brainly_data.question:
(PHYCHOLOGY). 

Which of the following is an example of groupthink?

A. Class officers who gather input to decide on a prom theme

B. Three senior officers who are friends and decide on a prom theme without asking anyone else

C. A church group that decides to build houses in Mexico

D. A group of good friends who decide to go camping over the weekend
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
(PHYCHOLOGY).

C. A church group that decides to build houses in Mexico

D. A group of good friends who decide to go camping over the weekend
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: A is the answer is it is deciding about group project
